request.description: Authenticates the user and returns the user's API token.
Logouts the user and removes the API key.

item.name: Get All Tickets for an Author

query.description: Sort the tickets by a specific field(s). Separate by comma. Denote desc with a minus sign.
Filter tickets by status code: A, C, H, X. Separate by comma.
Filter tickets by title. Wildcard supported.
Filter tickets by creation date. Can be a single date or a range separated by comma.
Filter tickets by update date. Can be a single date or a range separated by comma.

item.name: Store a Ticket for an Author

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"Fix the bug","description":"The bug is causing the application to crash.","status":"A"}},"author":1}

item.name: Delete a Ticket for an Author

request.description: Delete the specified ticket. Users can only delete their own tickets. Managers can delete any ticket.

item.name: Replace a Ticket for an Author

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"Fix the bug","description":"The bug is causing the application to crash.","status":"A"}},"author":"beatae"}

request.description: Replace the specified ticket. Managers only can replace tickets.

item.name: Update a Ticket for an Author

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"Fix the bug","description":"The bug is causing the application to crash.","status":"A"}},"author":"1"}

request.description: Update the specified ticket. Users can only update their own tickets. Managers can update any ticket.
